description.translate: Covered with notches, it bears the marks of many victories.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Casque du courageux\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Couvert d'entailles, il arbore\"}","{\"text\":\"§7les marques de nombreuses victoires.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Covered with notches, it bears\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the marks of many victories.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a1 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
